itching.description: An uncomfortable sensation that provokes the desire to scratch.
itching.causes: Allergic reactions, skin conditions like eczema, parasitic infestations such as scabies
itching.precautions: Avoid known allergens and irritants, maintain good skin hygiene.
itching.treatment: Use antihistamines, topical creams, and consult a dermatologist if persistent.

skin_rash.description: A noticeable change in the texture or color of the skin.
skin_rash.causes: Infections (viral, bacterial, fungal), allergic reactions, autoimmune diseases
skin_rash.precautions: Avoid contact with irritants and allergens, keep skin clean and moisturized.
skin_rash.treatment: Topical corticosteroids, antihistamines, and proper skin care as recommended by a healthcare provider.

nodal_skin_eruptions.description: Lumps or swellings on the skin that may indicate an underlying condition.
nodal_skin_eruptions.precautions: Monitor skin changes and avoid self-diagnosis.
nodal_skin_eruptions.treatment: Medical evaluation is needed; treatment depends on the underlying cause.

continuous_sneezing.causes: Allergic rhinitis, upper respiratory infections, exposure to irritants
continuous_sneezing.precautions: Avoid known allergens and polluted environments.
continuous_sneezing.treatment: Antihistamines, nasal sprays, and avoiding triggers.

shivering.description: Involuntary muscle contractions that result in shaking.
shivering.precautions: Keep warm and monitor body temperature.
shivering.treatment: Warm fluids, blankets, and treatment of the underlying cause.

chills.description: Feelings of coldness often accompanied by shivering.
chills.precautions: Avoid prolonged exposure to cold, rest and hydrate.
chills.treatment: Treat the underlying infection, use warm clothing and fluids.

joint_pain.description: Aches or discomfort in the joints.
joint_pain.precautions: Avoid excessive strain on joints and maintain a healthy weight.
joint_pain.treatment: Pain relievers, anti-inflammatory medications, and physical therapy.

stomach_pain.description: Pain or discomfort in the abdominal area.
stomach_pain.precautions: Avoid spicy and acidic foods; maintain a balanced diet.
stomach_pain.treatment: Antacids, dietary adjustments, and consultation with a healthcare provider.

acidity.description: A burning sensation in the chest or throat caused by stomach acid reflux.
acidity.causes: Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), dietary habits, hiatal hernia
acidity.precautions: Avoid trigger foods, eat smaller meals, and do not lie down immediately after eating.
acidity.treatment: Antacids, proton pump inhibitors, and lifestyle modifications.

ulcers_on_tongue.description: Open sores or lesions on the tongue.
ulcers_on_tongue.causes: Canker sores, viral infections, nutritional deficiencies
ulcers_on_tongue.precautions: Avoid spicy or acidic foods and maintain good oral hygiene.
ulcers_on_tongue.treatment: Topical anesthetics, mouth rinses, and addressing nutritional deficiencies.

muscle_wasting.description: Loss of muscle mass and strength over time.
muscle_wasting.precautions: Ensure adequate nutrition and regular exercise as tolerated.
muscle_wasting.treatment: Nutritional support, physical therapy, and addressing the underlying condition.

vomiting.description: Forceful expulsion of stomach contents through the mouth.
vomiting.precautions: Avoid dehydration by sipping fluids slowly.
vomiting.treatment: Oral rehydration solutions, antiemetics, and rest.

burning_micturition.causes: Urinary tract infections, sexually transmitted infections, bladder stones
burning_micturition.treatment: Antibiotics or other medications as prescribed by a healthcare provider.

spotting_urination.description: Light bleeding or spotting during urination.
spotting_urination.causes: Urinary tract infections, menstrual irregularities, trauma or irritation
spotting_urination.precautions: Seek medical advice if spotting persists.
spotting_urination.treatment: Diagnosis to determine the cause followed by appropriate treatment.

fatigue.description: A state of tiredness or lack of energy.
fatigue.causes: Anemia, sleep disorders, chronic fatigue syndrome
fatigue.precautions: Ensure adequate sleep and a balanced diet.
fatigue.treatment: Lifestyle modifications, rest, and addressing the underlying cause.

weight_gain.causes: Hypothyroidism, Cushing's syndrome, excessive calorie intake
weight_gain.precautions: Monitor dietary intake and exercise regularly.
weight_gain.treatment: Lifestyle changes and treatment of any underlying endocrine disorders.

anxiety.description: Feelings of worry, nervousness, or unease.
anxiety.causes: Stress, mental health disorders, substance abuse
anxiety.precautions: Practice stress management and seek support when needed.
anxiety.treatment: Therapy, counseling, and possibly medication as advised by a professional.

cold_hands_and_feets.precautions: Keep extremities warm and avoid smoking.
cold_hands_and_feets.treatment: Improve circulation through lifestyle changes and treat the underlying condition.

mood_swings.description: Rapid and extreme changes in emotional state.
mood_swings.precautions: Maintain a stable routine and manage stress levels.
mood_swings.treatment: Counseling, mood stabilizers, and proper medical evaluation.

weight_loss.precautions: Monitor dietary intake and seek medical evaluation if unexplained.
weight_loss.treatment: Address underlying causes and consider nutritional support.

restlessness.description: An inability to relax or remain still.
restlessness.causes: Anxiety, restless leg syndrome, stimulant use
restlessness.precautions: Engage in calming activities and avoid stimulants.
restlessness.treatment: Stress management, lifestyle modifications, and medical advice if persistent.

lethargy.description: A state of sluggishness or drowsiness.
lethargy.precautions: Ensure proper rest and balanced nutrition.
lethargy.treatment: Lifestyle changes, medical evaluation, and treating the underlying cause.

patches_in_throat.description: Visible spots or patches in the throat area.
patches_in_throat.precautions: Maintain good oral hygiene and avoid irritants.
patches_in_throat.treatment: Antibiotics or antifungal medications as prescribed.

irregular_sugar_level.causes: Diabetes mellitus, pancreatic disorders, hormonal imbalances
irregular_sugar_level.precautions: Monitor blood sugar levels regularly and maintain a balanced diet.
irregular_sugar_level.treatment: Medications, insulin therapy, and lifestyle management.

cough.description: A reflex action to clear the airways of irritants or mucus.
cough.causes: Common cold, asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)
cough.precautions: Avoid irritants such as smoke and pollutants.
cough.treatment: Cough suppressants, expectorants, and treating the underlying cause.

high_fever.description: An elevated body temperature, typically above 103째F (39.4째C).
high_fever.treatment: Antipyretics, cooling measures, and medical evaluation if persistent.

sunken_eyes.description: Eyes that appear hollow or recessed.
sunken_eyes.precautions: Increase fluid intake and maintain a balanced diet.
sunken_eyes.treatment: Rehydration and addressing the underlying cause.

breathlessness.precautions: Avoid strenuous activity and seek fresh air.
breathlessness.treatment: Bronchodilators, oxygen therapy, and treating the underlying condition.

sweating.description: Excessive production of sweat, which may occur even without physical exertion.
sweating.precautions: Wear breathable clothing and stay in a cool environment.
sweating.treatment: Antiperspirants, medications, and addressing underlying causes.

dehydration.description: A state where the body loses more fluids than it takes in.
dehydration.causes: Insufficient fluid intake, excessive sweating, diarrhoea or vomiting
dehydration.precautions: Drink adequate fluids and monitor fluid loss during illness.
dehydration.treatment: Oral rehydration solutions and, in severe cases, intravenous fluids.

indigestion.description: Discomfort or pain in the upper abdomen often after eating.
indigestion.precautions: Eat smaller, more frequent meals and avoid trigger foods.
indigestion.treatment: Antacids, dietary modifications, and consult a doctor if persistent.

headache.description: Pain in any region of the head.
headache.precautions: Avoid excessive screen time and ensure proper hydration.
headache.treatment: Pain relievers, hydration, and relaxation techniques.

yellowish_skin.description: A yellow tint to the skin, which may indicate jaundice.
yellowish_skin.causes: Liver disease, bile duct obstruction, hemolysis
yellowish_skin.precautions: Avoid alcohol and toxins, and get regular health check-ups.
yellowish_skin.treatment: Treat the underlying liver or biliary condition.

dark_urine.description: Urine that appears darker than usual.
dark_urine.causes: Dehydration, liver disorders, certain medications or foods
dark_urine.precautions: Maintain adequate hydration and monitor urine color.
dark_urine.treatment: Increase fluid intake and seek evaluation for liver function if needed.

nausea.description: A feeling of queasiness or the urge to vomit.
nausea.precautions: Avoid strong smells and heavy meals.

loss_of_appetite.precautions: Eat small, nutrient-rich meals and maintain a regular eating schedule.
loss_of_appetite.treatment: Address underlying causes and consider nutritional supplements if needed.

pain_behind_the_eyes.description: A sensation of pressure or pain located behind the eyes.
pain_behind_the_eyes.precautions: Reduce screen time and rest in a dim environment.
pain_behind_the_eyes.treatment: Decongestants, pain relievers, and proper eye care.

back_pain.description: Discomfort or pain in the back region.
back_pain.causes: Muscle strain, herniated disc, poor posture
back_pain.precautions: Maintain proper posture and use ergonomic furniture.
back_pain.treatment: Pain relievers, physical therapy, and rest.

constipation.description: Difficulty in passing stools or infrequent bowel movements.
constipation.causes: Diet low in fiber, dehydration, sedentary lifestyle
constipation.precautions: Increase dietary fiber and fluid intake.
constipation.treatment: Laxatives, dietary adjustments, and regular exercise.

abdominal_pain.description: Pain or discomfort in the abdominal area.
abdominal_pain.causes: Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), gastroenteritis, inflammatory bowel disease (IBD)
abdominal_pain.precautions: Avoid trigger foods and monitor symptoms.
abdominal_pain.treatment: Symptomatic treatment and addressing the underlying cause.

diarrhoea.precautions: Maintain hydration and avoid contaminated food or water.
diarrhoea.treatment: Oral rehydration solutions and, if needed, anti-diarrheal medications.

mild_fever.description: A slight increase in body temperature, often below 103째F (39.4째C).
mild_fever.causes: Viral infections, inflammatory responses, mild bacterial infections

yellow_urine.description: Urine that appears bright yellow, possibly indicating concentration or vitamin supplements.
yellow_urine.treatment: Increase fluid intake and adjust diet if necessary.

yellowing_of_eyes.description: A yellow tint to the whites of the eyes, typically a sign of jaundice.
yellowing_of_eyes.precautions: Avoid alcohol and seek early medical advice.
yellowing_of_eyes.treatment: Evaluate liver function and treat the underlying cause.

acute_liver_failure.description: A rapid loss of liver function.
acute_liver_failure.causes: Severe hepatitis, drug-induced liver injury, toxin ingestion
acute_liver_failure.treatment: Hospitalization, supportive care, and possibly liver transplant.

fluid_overload.description: Excess accumulation of fluid in the body tissues.
fluid_overload.causes: Kidney failure, heart failure, liver cirrhosis
fluid_overload.precautions: Monitor fluid intake and weight changes.
fluid_overload.treatment: Diuretics and treatment of the underlying condition.

swelling_of_stomach.description: Abnormal distension or bloating of the abdomen.
swelling_of_stomach.causes: Ascites due to liver disease, gastrointestinal disorders, obstruction
swelling_of_stomach.precautions: Avoid salt-rich foods and seek medical evaluation.
swelling_of_stomach.treatment: Treat the underlying cause and possibly use diuretics.

swelled_lymph_nodes.description: Enlarged lymph nodes that may be tender or firm.
swelled_lymph_nodes.precautions: Monitor size and seek evaluation if persistent.
swelled_lymph_nodes.treatment: Treatment depends on the cause; may include antibiotics or further investigation.

malaise.description: A general feeling of discomfort or unease.
malaise.treatment: Symptomatic treatment and addressing the underlying cause.

blurred_and_distorted_vision.description: Vision that appears fuzzy or distorted.
blurred_and_distorted_vision.precautions: Regular eye check-ups and protective eyewear when needed.
blurred_and_distorted_vision.treatment: Corrective lenses, medications, or surgical interventions as appropriate.

phlegm.description: Thick mucus produced in the respiratory tract.
phlegm.treatment: Expectorants, hydration, and treating the underlying infection.

throat_irritation.description: A scratchy or sore feeling in the throat.
throat_irritation.treatment: Throat lozenges, warm fluids, and rest.

redness_of_eyes.description: Eyes that appear red due to increased blood flow or irritation.
redness_of_eyes.precautions: Avoid rubbing the eyes and use protective eyewear in harsh environments.
redness_of_eyes.treatment: Eye drops, antihistamines, and proper eye hygiene.

sinus_pressure.description: A feeling of pressure or pain in the sinus areas.
sinus_pressure.precautions: Use a humidifier and avoid allergens.
sinus_pressure.treatment: Decongestants, nasal sprays, and warm compresses.

runny_nose.treatment: Antihistamines, decongestants, and nasal saline rinses.

congestion.description: Blockage or stuffiness in the nasal passages.
congestion.precautions: Keep the air moist and avoid irritants.
congestion.treatment: Nasal decongestants, steam inhalation, and rest.

chest_pain.description: Discomfort or pain in the chest area.
chest_pain.causes: Cardiac issues, musculoskeletal problems, gastroesophageal reflux
chest_pain.precautions: Avoid heavy physical exertion until evaluated.
chest_pain.treatment: Medical evaluation is necessary; treatment depends on the cause.

weakness_in_limbs.description: Reduced strength or energy in the arms or legs.
weakness_in_limbs.precautions: Avoid overexertion and seek timely medical advice.
weakness_in_limbs.treatment: Supportive care, physical therapy, and treating the underlying condition.

fast_heart_rate.description: An increased heart rate that may feel rapid or irregular.
fast_heart_rate.treatment: Beta-blockers or other medications as advised by a doctor.

pain_during_bowel_movements.description: Discomfort or pain while passing stools.
pain_during_bowel_movements.causes: Hemorrhoids, anal fissures, inflammatory bowel conditions
pain_during_bowel_movements.precautions: Maintain a high-fiber diet and proper hygiene.
pain_during_bowel_movements.treatment: Topical treatments, stool softeners, and consultation with a specialist.

pain_in_anal_region.precautions: Keep the area clean and avoid prolonged sitting.
pain_in_anal_region.treatment: Topical creams, warm baths, and medical evaluation.

bloody_stool.description: The presence of blood in the stool.
bloody_stool.treatment: Diagnosis to determine the cause, followed by appropriate intervention.

irritation_in_anus.description: Discomfort or itching in the anal region.
irritation_in_anus.precautions: Maintain cleanliness and use gentle cleansing agents.
irritation_in_anus.treatment: Topical medications and improved hygiene practices.

neck_pain.description: Pain or stiffness in the neck region.
neck_pain.precautions: Maintain proper posture and avoid sudden neck movements.
neck_pain.treatment: Pain relievers, physical therapy, and warm compresses.

dizziness.description: A feeling of lightheadedness or unsteadiness.
dizziness.causes: Low blood pressure, dehydration, inner ear disorders
dizziness.precautions: Rise slowly from seated or lying positions.
dizziness.treatment: Hydration, rest, and medical evaluation if recurrent.

cramps.precautions: Stretch regularly and maintain electrolyte balance.

bruising.description: Discoloration under the skin due to bleeding.
bruising.causes: Injury, clotting disorders, medications such as anticoagulants
bruising.precautions: Protect against injuries and monitor medication effects.
bruising.treatment: Cold compresses, rest, and medical evaluation for abnormal bruising.

obesity.causes: Poor diet, sedentary lifestyle, genetic factors
obesity.precautions: Maintain a balanced diet and regular physical activity.
obesity.treatment: Lifestyle modifications, nutritional counseling, and medical support.

swollen_legs.description: Enlarged or puffy appearance of the legs.
swollen_legs.precautions: Elevate legs and avoid prolonged standing.
swollen_legs.treatment: Diuretics, compression stockings, and treating the underlying cause.

swollen_blood_vessels.description: Enlargement or prominence of blood vessels.
swollen_blood_vessels.precautions: Avoid prolonged standing and monitor vascular health.
swollen_blood_vessels.treatment: Medical evaluation and treatment based on the cause.

puffy_face_and_eyes.description: Swelling in the facial area and around the eyes.
puffy_face_and_eyes.precautions: Avoid allergens and monitor salt intake.
puffy_face_and_eyes.treatment: Antihistamines, diuretics, and treating the underlying condition.

enlarged_thyroid.precautions: Maintain adequate iodine intake and monitor thyroid function.
enlarged_thyroid.treatment: Medication, dietary adjustments, and possibly surgery.

brittle_nails.description: Weak or fragile nails that break easily.
brittle_nails.precautions: Maintain a balanced diet and proper nail care.
brittle_nails.treatment: Nutritional supplements, antifungal treatments, and moisturizing.

swollen_extremeties.description: Swelling in the arms or legs.
swollen_extremeties.precautions: Elevate affected limbs and avoid excessive salt intake.
swollen_extremeties.treatment: Diuretics and treating the underlying condition.

excessive_hunger.causes: Hyperthyroidism, diabetes mellitus, medication side effects
excessive_hunger.precautions: Monitor eating habits and blood sugar levels.

extra_marital_contacts.description: Involvement in sexual relationships outside of marriage, which can be a risk factor for infections.
extra_marital_contacts.causes: Increased risk for sexually transmitted infections
extra_marital_contacts.precautions: Practice safe sex and regular health screenings.
extra_marital_contacts.treatment: Prevention is key; treatment is based on the infection if acquired.

drying_and_tingling_lips.description: Lips that feel dry with a tingling sensation.
drying_and_tingling_lips.precautions: Use lip balm and stay hydrated.
drying_and_tingling_lips.treatment: Topical moisturizers and addressing nutritional gaps.

slurred_speech.precautions: Avoid driving or operating machinery until evaluated.
slurred_speech.treatment: Immediate medical evaluation and supportive care.

knee_pain.description: Discomfort or pain in the knee joint.
knee_pain.precautions: Avoid excessive strain and use proper supportive footwear.

hip_joint_pain.description: Pain or discomfort in the hip joint.
hip_joint_pain.precautions: Maintain a healthy weight and avoid strenuous activities.

muscle_weakness.causes: Neuromuscular disorders, electrolyte imbalances, chronic illnesses
muscle_weakness.precautions: Avoid overexertion and maintain balanced nutrition.
muscle_weakness.treatment: Physical therapy, nutritional support, and addressing the underlying cause.

stiff_neck.description: Pain and limited mobility in the neck.
stiff_neck.precautions: Avoid sudden movements and use supportive pillows.
stiff_neck.treatment: Warm compresses, pain relievers, and medical evaluation if severe.

swelling_joints.description: Enlargement or puffiness in the joints.
swelling_joints.precautions: Avoid joint stress and maintain a healthy weight.

movement_stiffness.description: Difficulty moving due to stiffness in the muscles or joints.
movement_stiffness.precautions: Incorporate gentle stretching and regular exercise.
movement_stiffness.treatment: Pain relievers, physiotherapy, and lifestyle modifications.

spinning_movements.description: A sensation that the surroundings are spinning (vertigo).
spinning_movements.causes: Inner ear issues, vestibular disorders, low blood pressure
spinning_movements.precautions: Move slowly and avoid sudden head movements.

loss_of_balance.causes: Neurological conditions, inner ear disorders, medication side effects
loss_of_balance.precautions: Use support when walking and remove tripping hazards.
loss_of_balance.treatment: Balance exercises and treating the underlying cause.

unsteadiness.description: A feeling of being unstable or off-balance.
unsteadiness.precautions: Sit or lie down if feeling unsteady and seek assistance.

weakness_of_one_body_side.description: Reduced strength on one side of the body.
weakness_of_one_body_side.treatment: Urgent medical care and rehabilitative therapies.

loss_of_smell.description: A decreased or lost sense of smell.
loss_of_smell.precautions: Avoid hazardous substances and seek evaluation if persistent.
loss_of_smell.treatment: Address underlying cause and consider smell training.

bladder_discomfort.description: Pain or discomfort in the bladder area.
bladder_discomfort.causes: Urinary tract infections, interstitial cystitis, bladder stones
bladder_discomfort.precautions: Maintain proper hydration and urinate regularly.
bladder_discomfort.treatment: Antibiotics, pain relievers, and further evaluation if needed.

foul_smell_ofurine.description: Urine that emits a strong, unpleasant odor.
foul_smell_ofurine.causes: Urinary tract infections, dehydration, certain foods or medications
foul_smell_ofurine.treatment: Treat the underlying infection and adjust diet if necessary.

continuous_feel_of_urine.description: A persistent sensation of needing to urinate even after voiding.
continuous_feel_of_urine.causes: Urinary tract infections, overactive bladder, interstitial cystitis
continuous_feel_of_urine.precautions: Avoid bladder irritants such as caffeine.
continuous_feel_of_urine.treatment: Medications to relax the bladder and treat infections.

passage_of_gases.description: Excess gas expelled from the digestive system.
passage_of_gases.causes: Dietary factors, digestive disorders, food intolerances
passage_of_gases.precautions: Monitor diet and avoid gas-producing foods.
passage_of_gases.treatment: Over-the-counter anti-gas medications and dietary modifications.

internal_itching.description: Itching felt internally, often affecting mucosal surfaces.
internal_itching.causes: Allergic reactions, systemic infections, inflammatory conditions
internal_itching.precautions: Seek medical advice if the sensation is severe or persistent.
internal_itching.treatment: Address the underlying condition and symptomatic relief.

toxic_look_(typhos).description: An appearance that may indicate a severe infection or poisoning, often seen in typhoid fever.
toxic_look_(typhos).precautions: Seek immediate medical attention if this appearance is observed.

depression.description: A persistent feeling of sadness or loss of interest.
depression.causes: Mental health disorders, hormonal imbalances, chronic stress
depression.precautions: Seek mental health support and maintain a supportive environment.
depression.treatment: Therapy, counseling, and medication as prescribed by a mental health professional.

irritability.description: A tendency to become easily annoyed or angered.
irritability.causes: Stress, hormonal changes, lack of sleep
irritability.precautions: Manage stress and ensure adequate rest.
irritability.treatment: Relaxation techniques, counseling, and addressing the underlying cause.

muscle_pain.description: Aches or soreness in the muscles.
muscle_pain.precautions: Avoid excessive physical activity and stretch regularly.
muscle_pain.treatment: Pain relievers, rest, and applying warm compresses.

altered_sensorium.precautions: Seek immediate medical evaluation if mental status changes occur.
altered_sensorium.treatment: Supportive care and treating the underlying cause.

red_spots_over_body.description: Small red spots or rashes appearing on the skin.
red_spots_over_body.causes: Viral infections, allergic reactions, petechiae from low platelets
red_spots_over_body.precautions: Avoid scratching and monitor for spread.

belly_pain.description: Discomfort or pain in the abdominal area.
belly_pain.precautions: Monitor food intake and avoid known irritants.
belly_pain.treatment: Symptomatic treatment and further evaluation if severe.

abnormal_menstruation.description: Irregularities or changes in the menstrual cycle.
abnormal_menstruation.causes: Hormonal imbalances, polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS), thyroid disorders
abnormal_menstruation.precautions: Keep a menstrual diary and monitor symptoms.
abnormal_menstruation.treatment: Hormonal therapy and lifestyle modifications as advised by a gynecologist.

dischromic_patches.description: Areas of skin with altered pigmentation.
dischromic_patches.precautions: Use sun protection and avoid skin trauma.

watering_from_eyes.causes: Allergies, conjunctivitis, irritation from foreign bodies
watering_from_eyes.precautions: Avoid rubbing the eyes and use protective eyewear if needed.

increased_appetite.precautions: Monitor food intake and avoid overeating.
increased_appetite.treatment: Address underlying conditions and consider dietary counseling.

polyuria.description: Excessive production or passage of urine.
polyuria.causes: Diabetes mellitus, diuretic use, kidney dysfunction
polyuria.precautions: Monitor fluid intake and urine output.
polyuria.treatment: Manage blood sugar levels and adjust medications as needed.

family_history.description: A record of similar conditions in family members, indicating a genetic predisposition.
family_history.precautions: Inform healthcare providers about family medical history.

mucoid_sputum.precautions: Avoid smoking and exposure to pollutants.
mucoid_sputum.treatment: Expectorants, hydration, and treatment of the underlying cause.

rusty_sputum.description: Sputum that has a rust-like color, indicating the presence of blood.
rusty_sputum.precautions: Seek prompt medical evaluation if noticed.
rusty_sputum.treatment: Antibiotic therapy and further diagnostic tests.

lack_of_concentration.description: Difficulty in focusing or maintaining attention.
lack_of_concentration.precautions: Maintain a structured routine and minimize distractions.
lack_of_concentration.treatment: Behavioral therapy, adequate rest, and possibly medication.

visual_disturbances.description: Problems with sight, including blurriness or double vision.
visual_disturbances.precautions: Regular eye examinations and proper lighting while reading.
visual_disturbances.treatment: Corrective lenses or other treatments as recommended by an eye specialist.

receiving_blood_transfusion.description: A history of blood transfusions, which may be relevant as a risk factor.
receiving_blood_transfusion.causes: Exposure to bloodborne pathogens, underlying anemia
receiving_blood_transfusion.precautions: Ensure transfusions are conducted in sterile settings.
receiving_blood_transfusion.treatment: Follow-up testing and monitoring after transfusions.

receiving_unsterile_injections.description: A history of receiving injections under non-sterile conditions, increasing infection risk.
receiving_unsterile_injections.treatment: Screening for infections and appropriate treatment if detected.

coma.causes: Severe brain injury, drug overdose, metabolic disturbances

stomach_bleeding.description: Internal bleeding within the stomach, which may be life-threatening.
stomach_bleeding.precautions: Avoid NSAIDs and seek immediate help if bleeding is suspected.
stomach_bleeding.treatment: Hospitalization, endoscopy, and medications to reduce acid.

distention_of_abdomen.description: Abnormal swelling or enlargement of the abdomen.
distention_of_abdomen.precautions: Monitor abdominal girth and seek evaluation for sudden changes.
distention_of_abdomen.treatment: Medical assessment and management based on the underlying cause.

history_of_alcohol_consumption.description: A background of regular or excessive alcohol intake, which can predispose to other conditions.
history_of_alcohol_consumption.precautions: Limit alcohol intake and seek help for dependency if needed.
history_of_alcohol_consumption.treatment: Lifestyle modifications and treatment for alcohol-related conditions.

blood_in_sputum.description: The presence of blood mixed with mucus when coughing.
blood_in_sputum.precautions: Seek immediate medical evaluation if noticed.
blood_in_sputum.treatment: Diagnostic tests and appropriate treatment based on the cause.

prominent_veins_on_calf.description: Visible, enlarged veins in the calf region.
prominent_veins_on_calf.precautions: Avoid prolonged sitting and exercise regularly.
prominent_veins_on_calf.treatment: Compression stockings and, if necessary, medical intervention.

palpitations.description: The sensation of a rapid or irregular heartbeat.
palpitations.treatment: Beta-blockers or other medications as prescribed by a doctor.

painful_walking.description: Discomfort or pain experienced while walking.
painful_walking.precautions: Avoid overexertion and use supportive footwear.
painful_walking.treatment: Pain relievers and evaluation for vascular or musculoskeletal issues.

pus_filled_pimples.precautions: Maintain proper facial hygiene and avoid touching the face.

blackheads.description: Small dark spots on the skin caused by clogged pores.
blackheads.precautions: Cleanse skin regularly and use non-comedogenic products.
blackheads.treatment: Topical retinoids and proper skin care.

scurring.description: Crusty or scab-like formations on the skin as wounds heal.
scurring.causes: Skin infections, healing of skin injuries
scurring.treatment: Proper wound care and, if necessary, topical antibiotics.

skin_peeling.description: The shedding or flaking of the outer skin layer.
skin_peeling.precautions: Avoid excessive sun exposure and use sunscreen.
skin_peeling.treatment: Moisturizers and soothing lotions, with medical advice if severe.

silver_like_dusting.description: A fine, dust-like appearance on the skin resembling silver particles.
silver_like_dusting.precautions: Keep skin clean and avoid irritants.
silver_like_dusting.treatment: Topical treatments and consultation with a dermatologist.

small_dents_in_nails.description: Indentations or pits on the surface of the nails.
small_dents_in_nails.precautions: Protect nails from injury and maintain good nail care.
small_dents_in_nails.treatment: Nutritional support and topical treatments if needed.

inflammatory_nails.description: Nails showing signs of inflammation, discoloration, or damage.
inflammatory_nails.treatment: Antifungal treatments and appropriate nail care.

blister.description: A small pocket of fluid that forms between the upper layers of the skin.
blister.precautions: Avoid further friction and protect the area.
blister.treatment: Keep clean, use protective dressings, and let heal naturally.

red_sore_around_nose.description: A painful, red lesion near the nose.
red_sore_around_nose.precautions: Avoid picking at the area and maintain hygiene.
red_sore_around_nose.treatment: Topical antibiotics and consultation with a dermatologist.

yellow_crust_ooze.description: Yellowish, crusty discharge from skin lesions.
yellow_crust_ooze.precautions: Avoid touching the lesions and maintain hygiene.
yellow_crust_ooze.treatment: Antibiotic ointments and medical evaluation if spread occurs.

prognosis.description: An expected outcome or course of a disease based on current evidence.
prognosis.causes: Depends on the underlying condition and treatment effectiveness
prognosis.precautions: Follow up regularly with healthcare providers.
prognosis.treatment: Management varies based on diagnosis and individual factors.
